paper.title: Fast Printed Circuit Board Routing

author.org: Digital Equipment Corporation Western Research Laboratory, 100 Hamilton Avenue, Palo Alto, CA

paper.abstract: This paper describes the algorithms in a printed circuit board router used for fully automatic routing of high-density circuit boards. Completely automatic routing and running times of a few minutes have resulted from a new data structure for efficient representation of the routing grid, quick searches for optimal solutions, and generalizations of Leeu0027s algorithm.
